org.company.jacoco

Class JaCoCoParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.company.jacoco.JaCoCoUtil

  • public class JaCoCoParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for parsing JaCoCo methods coverage output to extract valuable information like instructions and branches coverage from JaCoCo reports

    • Nested Class Summary

      (package private) static class  JaCoCoParser.JaCoCoExecHandler
      Custom visitor for the XML document.

      This methods takes as input a "jacoco.exec" file and converts it in XML with the JaCoCo CLI
      java.util.ArrayList<JaCoCoMethod> parseFromXML(java.io.File jacocoReportToParse)
      This method takes as input a .xml JaCoCo report and parses it to extract, for each method, the class FQN and instructions/branches coverage

    • Method Detail

      • convertJaCoCoExecToXML

        public void convertJaCoCoExecToXML(java.lang.String pathOfJaCoCoExecFile,
                                   java.lang.String pathOfJaCoCoXMLFile,
                                   java.lang.String pathOfJaCoCoCLI,
                                   java.lang.String pathOfJarWithClasses)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        This methods takes as input a "jacoco.exec" file and converts it in XML with the JaCoCo CLI
        Parameters:
        pathOfJaCoCoExecFile - the absolute path to the .exec file to convert
        pathOfJaCoCoXMLFile - the absolute path to where to create the converted .xml
        pathOfJaCoCoCLI - the absolute path to the JaCoCo CLI jar
        pathOfJarWithClasses - the absolute path of the jar containing the classes on which the tests were executed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • parseFromXML

        public java.util.ArrayList<JaCoCoMethod> parseFromXML(java.io.File jacocoReportToParse)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method takes as input a .xml JaCoCo report and parses it to extract, for each method, the class FQN and instructions/branches coverage
        Parameters:
        jacocoReportToParse - the JaCoCo XML file to parse
        Returns:
        an array of JaCoCoMethod along with their coverage (branch, instructions, ...)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
